description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Play single player or online with three other people in a co-operative zombie hunt.  Try to make it through 20 challenging levels infested by the zombie horde. Collect weapons, smash crates, and detonate barrels along with three of your friends in this fast paced zombie shooter.
description.short: Play single player or online with three other people in a co-operative zombie hunt.  Try to make it through 20 challenging levels infested by the zombie horde. Collect weapons, smash crates, and detonate barrels along with three of your friends in this fast paced zombie shooter.
